projects.name: health
projects.description: Tinkering with Apple HealthKit and the LiDAR sensors in Apple iPhones for gait analysis and wellness monitoring.
projects.longDescription: This project combines cutting-edge mobile technology with health analytics to provide comprehensive wellness insights. Using Apple's HealthKit framework for health data collection and the advanced LiDAR sensors available in modern iPhones, the platform performs sophisticated gait analysis to help users understand their walking patterns and overall physical health. The application employs machine learning algorithms to identify trends and provide personalized recommendations.
highlights: Real-time gait analysis using LiDAR depth sensing
Integration with Apple HealthKit for comprehensive health data
Privacy-first approach to sensitive health data

projects.name: huggingface
projects.description: Experimenting with HuggingFace models and AI/ML integrations.
projects.longDescription: An experimental project exploring the HuggingFace ecosystem for machine learning and AI model integration. This project demonstrates how to leverage pre-trained models for various AI tasks.

projects.name: weather
projects.description: Playing around with weather app features and Android app integration using Capacitor.
projects.longDescription: This weather application showcases modern mobile development practices by building a single codebase that compiles to both Android and iOS using Capacitor. The app provides detailed weather information with an intuitive interface, demonstrating the power of cross-platform development while maintaining native performance and user experience. Features include location-based forecasts, severe weather alerts, and interactive weather maps.
highlights: Single codebase for iOS and Android

projects.name: homehub
projects.description: A centralized home automation control center for managing IoT devices, smart home systems, and automations from a unified interface.
projects.longDescription: HomeHub provides a comprehensive solution for managing modern smart homes. This platform integrates with various IoT protocols and devices to offer a unified control interface for lights, thermostats, security systems, and more. Built with TypeScript for type safety and maintainability, it emphasizes user experience and real-time responsiveness. The hub supports custom automation scenarios and provides detailed analytics about home energy usage and device activity.
highlights: Unified control for multiple smart home platforms

projects.name: couple-connect
projects.description: Accountability app for couples to identify areas for improvement and track shared goals.
projects.longDescription: Couple Connect is a unique application that helps couples improve their relationships through accountability, goal tracking, and effective communication. The app provides tools for setting shared goals, tracking progress, and identifying areas for growth. Built with React and deployed on Cloudflare's edge network for global performance, it includes features like mood tracking, shared calendars, and communication exercises designed by relationship experts. The application prioritizes privacy and security for sensitive relationship data.
highlights: Global edge deployment for fast performance

projects.name: network
projects.description: Testing UniFi API for network monitoring, analysis, and management of Ubiquiti networking equipment.
projects.longDescription: This Python-based tool interfaces with Ubiquiti's UniFi API to provide comprehensive network monitoring, analysis, and management capabilities. It offers detailed insights into network traffic patterns, device connectivity, bandwidth usage, and potential security issues. The tool is designed for network administrators and enthusiasts who want deeper visibility into their network infrastructure beyond what standard management interfaces provide.
highlights: Deep integration with UniFi networking equipment

projects.name: hack
projects.description: A hacking simulator built in Rust for learning cybersecurity concepts.
projects.longDescription: This educational tool provides a safe, legal environment for learning about cybersecurity and ethical hacking concepts. Built in Rust for performance and safety, the simulator presents realistic hacking scenarios where users can learn about common vulnerabilities, security best practices, and penetration testing techniques. The project demonstrates advanced Rust programming concepts while making cybersecurity education accessible and engaging.
highlights: Safe environment for learning security concepts
Built with Rust for performance and safety
Educational and engaging approach to cybersecurity

projects.name: catastrophe
projects.description: CATastrophe: A Mischief Simulator - experimenting with Unreal Engine and C++ game development.
projects.longDescription: CATastrophe is an experimental game development project using Unreal Engine and C++. Players control a curious cat navigating through detailed 3D environments, knocking objects off shelves, hiding in boxes, and generally causing adorable mayhem. The project serves as a learning experience in game development, 3D physics, and Unreal Engine's powerful capabilities. It showcases advanced C++ programming in a game development context and demonstrates skills in 3D modeling, physics simulation, and game design.
highlights: Advanced physics simulation for realistic interactions

projects.name: vitalsense-mobile
projects.description: A mobile health monitoring application focused on tracking and analyzing vital health metrics with real-time insights.
projects.longDescription: VitalSense Mobile is a comprehensive health monitoring platform that helps users track vital health metrics including heart rate, blood pressure, oxygen levels, and more. The application provides real-time insights, trend analysis, and personalized health recommendations. With a focus on user privacy and data security, it enables users to take control of their health data while receiving actionable insights powered by modern analytics techniques.
